#summary About Movico

= What is Movico? =

Movico is a MVC framework for PHP inspired by JSF principles. It supports
 * Writing request-scoped and session-scoped managed beans
 * Writing XML views with JSF-like components (inputText, dataTable, ...)
 * Generating domain models, services and SQL from an entity definition file

Movico is entirely written in OOP PHP.

= Example =

Check out the 2-minute [MvcExample] for an instant view on the capabilities and ease-of-use that makes Movico your ideal MVC development companion.
